title: Hatchy
author: Hatchy
created_time: November 19, 2023, 12:10:44 PMLast edit: November 05, 2024, 10:10:25 PM by Hatchy
content: Link to our op: [OFNT] [AOBT] The Alliance Of Bitcointalk Translatorscorrect translations for ur work dem and d forum. people wey dey d Gang:QuotePolish & GermancyganRomanianGazetaBitcoinRussianzasad@IndonesianHusna QATurkishmindrustFrenchpaid2SpanishPorfiriiUkrainian (Rus back-up)DrBeerArabicKavelj22FilipinoPeanutswarIndonesian back-updansus021Portuguesegagux123BanglaLearn BitcoinPidginHatchyPidgin back-upChilwellArabic back-upNalain420Portuguese back-upr_victoryBangla back-upDYING_S0UL make you apply NowIf you wan know more, press dis one make you apply now!If you wan know more, press dis one The Alliance Of Bitcointalk Translators [AOBT] na gang of people Dem wey no dey under person and we dey active for we forum. we con gather say we wan put more correct tin join we local boards dem and better projects, wey be our own. we no get manager, but we dey fit allign with other correct managers for we forum. if u dey run bounty, signature or any kin campaign dem and u wan get free translation service, no fear, make u message us.- watin we dey doif we find new translations, we dey share am with other members dem, dis wan na to help each other find new translation(to find Dem by ourself no easy).we dey translate some of d best post or threads wey dey forum for we local board pro bono to take add more information, and also give back watin dis better forum done give uswe dey commot watin dey block local board and carry correct tori and experience share am with our people dem wey dey other country dat wan na because all of us na satoshi no matter where we from come- y uswe dey among d members wey dey active pass for forum.we no only dey translate words Dem, but we dey translate our own idea join. nd we also get better experience with translation from our soul.we go fit give u correct tin, wey ur money carry.d tin be say u don no us b4, so we dey hold our reputation strong.if u carry us take run ur work, dat one mean say u sef wan add better value join d local board for forum- Watin we no dey translate tins wey dey against d law.Scam.Etc. (every person Dem na e no how e take dey wen e con be say na gamble or porn,...).- good news wey we shareGazetaBitcoin: work wey don pass 60 translations. I don translate Bitcoin white paper wey dey bitcoin.org.mindrust: translation na my work, and work dey well.Porfirii: I don translate pass 70 work to Spanish since 2017. u fit ask for my porf-olio.Kavelj22: correct Arabic translator and proofreader for we forum.u fit reach us:[1] for translations wey u need to pay: if u want make we translate ur project, abeg drop d post for here or u fit message us and we go show u our price[2] for translations wey dey free: if u wan drop particular correct post make we translate to ur local boards dem, u dey free to let us know. just post am for dis thread. if we see more options like dat, we go fit do plenti translations. u wan help us? Sponsor our Alliance and/or particular topics.Escrow for payments: GazetaBitcoin.MAKE I CLEAR MYSELF:-------------------------------------even doh say we sef still dey try translate correct work, we no get hand if d particular manager dem con make wrong decision. we only dey do our work as translator of work wey don already dey ground to watin dem write.-------------------------------------if u no believe or get proof of d Â project wey we dey do, say e no correct or good abeg tell us.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: @Hatchy, I just checked the English thread[1] and I see say dem don add some new participants join the list of translators, so he go make more sense if you add them to this list so that both the English version and pidgin version go contain the same content. Learn Bitcoin for Bangla translations DYING_S0UL for Bangla (back-up 1) translation

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on December 20, 2023, 02:23:32 PM@Hatchy, I just checked the English thread[1] and I see say dem don add some new participants join the list of translators, so he go make more sense if you add them to this list so that both the English version and pidgin version go contain the same content. Learn Bitcoin for Bangla translations DYING_S0UL for Bangla (back-up 1) translationOkay @cantsay, tank u for d remainder. Dis wan go also good sef make I tell other members of my gang make Dem go update Dem own thread.
